# Active Dashboards (SY22-23)

<br>

<a href="https://www.youtube.com/">End of Session Dashboard Tutorial</a>  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="https://www.youtube.com/">End of Course Dashboard Tutorial</a>

```{r active-dashboards, echo = F, layout = "l-page"}
library(bs4cards)

report_galleries <- tibble::tibble(
  location = c("Facilitator facing dashboards",
               "Internal End of Session Dashboard",
               "Internal End of Course Dashboard",
               "Knowledge Assessments Dashboards",
               "Coming soon: Educator Survey Dashboard",
               "Coming soon: Student Survey Dashboard",
               "Coming soon: IPG Dashboard"),
  long_name = location,
  image_url = c(here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsDashboard.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsSession.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsCourse.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsKnowledgeAssessment.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/BlankDashboard.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/BlankDashboard.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/BlankDashboard.png")),
  link = c("https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/FacilitatorAuth/",
           "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/62cf1818b2bfe20010b73370?pageId=Page_b7e6ec6e-e184-4ac4-8026-588b45199a2a",
           "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/62f3cbf2bcc32c0010a7db88?pageId=Page_a4a3fb0e-2d6a-402c-9008-b299c554fd57",
           "22_23_knowledge_assessments.html",
           "#",
           "#",
           "#")
)

report_galleries |>
  cards(
    title = "",
    footer = long_name,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    width = 2,
    layout = "inset-bottom",
    spacing = 3
  )
```

# Visualizations

<br>

```{r visualizations, echo = F}
time_diff <- Sys.Date() - as.Date("2019-01-01")
year_diff <- round(as.numeric(time_diff)/365)
galleries3 <- tibble::tibble(
  long_name = c("Visualizing and textualizing TL data.",
                "How much does each US state spend per kid per capita over time?"),
  blurb = c(paste0("A visualization of ", year_diff, " years of reviews of Teaching Lab courses by type of content."),
            ""),
  image_url = c(here::here("Images/Visualizations/Reviews.png"),
                here::here("Images/Visualizations/SpendingperKid.png")),
  link = c("https://teachinglab.github.io/TLReviews.html",
           "https://teachinglab.github.io/USStateSpendingperKid.html")
)

galleries3 |>
  cards(
    title = long_name,
    text = blurb,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    layout = "label-below", 
    width = 2,
    spacing = 3
  )
```
